rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a traditional Kerala-style portico. The mandapa is designed to welcome and align according to Vastu principles, ensuring positive energy flow.
Modern yet traditional kitchen with adequate storage and a well-lit environment. Vastu-compliant placement on the east side.
A large living room that serves as a common area for family gatherings. Placed in the center to ensure balance and harmony.
Spacious master bedroom with an attached bathroom. Positioned in the north-east to align with Vastu for prosperity and calm.
Cozy bedroom suitable for guest or family member. Ensures privacy and quietness with proper natural ventilation.
Additional bedroom ensuring space for the family. Vastu guidelines ensure that this room is placed in a balanced area of the layout.
A dedicated library space designed with ample shelving and comfortable seating. The room is positioned in the south-west corner for knowledge and creativity.
Small pantry connected to the kitchen. Provides additional storage in compliance with Vastu's emphasis on organization.
A small guest toilet placed near the entrance for convenience and Vastu considerations regarding water disposal.
A utility room for storage of cleaning supplies and appliances. Careful placement ensures it is not in the path of main energy flow.
An outdoor balcony integrated into the ground floor for fresh air and natural light. Aligned per Vastu to enhance energy balance.

openings.description: Traditional Kerala-style entrance with steps leading to the mandapa. Positioned on the north to adhere to Vastu principles.
Open space adjacent to the main entrance that serves as an inviting transitional area before entering the house.
Vastu-compliant windows on east and north sides for optimal sunlight and ventilation. Large glass panels to enhance natural light while maintaining privacy.
Multiple exits across the floor plan to ensure easy evacuation and good ventilation as per local norms.

levels.notes: The design incorporates Vastu principles by carefully orienting spaces such as the kitchen (east) and master bedroom (north-east), along with the library in the south-west to encourage creativity and knowledge. The irregular plot is addressed through flexible room arrangements ensuring both aesthetic appeal and functional space utilization.
